jam.global
Interface MessageHandler

All Known Implementing Classes:
JamConsole, MessageAdaptor
public interface MessageHandler

This interface handles messages that are to be output to the screen. This usually on the jam.JamConsole, but could be MessageAdaptor if the full Jam is not started up.

Author:
Ken Swartz
